document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph:
Prozercon Sellnick, 1943
•
Prozercon fimbriatus (Koch, 1839)
• Original name :
Zercon fimbriatus Koch, 1839
. • In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc. 27 (7). • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Zercon trigonus Berlese
( Halbert, 1915 ; Hull, 1918 ).

Irish Records : Moss ( Halbert, 1915 ); nest of
Lasius flavus
and pasture (
Arroyo et al ., 2015
).
Counties: Limerick, Offaly .

• Original name :
Zercon tragardhi Halbert, 1923
.
• In : Journal of the Linnean Society ( Zoology ), 35: 375.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Zercon Trägårdhi Halbert (Halbert, 1923)
.
Irish Records : Decaying henbane plants ( Halbert, 1923 ).
Counties: Dublin .

• Original name :
Zercon abaculus Koch, 1839
.
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc. 27 (4).
Irish Records : Fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ).
Counties: Not specified.

• Original name :
Zercon perforatulus var. colligans Berlese, 1920
.

• In
Redia
, 14: 190.
Irish Records : Fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ).
Counties: Not specified.

bibRefCitation.author: Moraza, M. L. & Arroyo, J. & Bolger, T.
bibRefCitation.refString: Moraza, M. L., Arroyo, J. & Bolger, T. (2009) Three new species of mites (Acari: Zerconidae) from canopy habitats in Irish forests. Zootaxa, 2019, 29 - 39.

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Original name :
Zercon curryi
Moraza et al ., 2009
.
• In : Zootaxa , 2019: 30.

Irish Records : On bark of oak and in moss on oak, Scots pine, ash; canopy of ash, oak and yew (
Moraza et al ., 2009
;
Arroyo et al ., 2010
, 2012, 2013a, b).
Counties: Clare, Kerry, Laois, Roscommon, Sligo .

bibRefCitation.author: Moraza, M. L. & Arroyo, J. & Bolger, T.
bibRefCitation.refString: Moraza, M. L., Arroyo, J. & Bolger, T. (2009) Three new species of mites (Acari: Zerconidae) from canopy habitats in Irish forests. Zootaxa, 2019, 29 - 39.

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Original name:
Zercon darai Moraza, 2009
.
• In : Zootaxa , 2019: 32.

Irish Records : Soil under oak; moss on soil under ash; moss on oak, ash, Scots pine and Sitka spruce; canopy of ash, oak and Sitka spruce (
Moraza et al ., 2009
;
Arroyo et al ., 2010
, 2012, 2013a, b).
Counties: Clare, Cork, Kerry, Laois, Offaly, Roscommon, Tipperary .

bibRefCitation.author: Moraza, M. L. & Arroyo, J. & Bolger, T.
bibRefCitation.refString: Moraza, M. L., Arroyo, J. & Bolger, T. (2009) Three new species of mites (Acari: Zerconidae) from canopy habitats in Irish forests. Zootaxa, 2019, 29 - 39.

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Original name :
Zercon hibernia
Moraza et al ., 2009
.
• In : Zootaxa , 2019: 34.

Irish Records : Soil under oak; bark of ash, Scots pine, Sitka spruce; moss on ash, oak, Scots pine, Sitka spruce; canopy of ash, oak, Scots pine, Sitka spruce and Yew (
Moraza et al ., 2009
;
Arroyo et al ., 2010
, 2012, 2013a, b).
Counties: Clare, Cork, Galway, Kerry, Kildare, Laois, Offaly, Roscommon, Sligo, Wicklow .

• Original name :
Zercon triangulus var. perforatulus Berlese, 1904
.

• In :
Redia
, 1: 269.
Irish Records : Under chips of wood and in moss ( Halbert, 1923 ).
Counties: Mayo, Wicklow .

• Original name :
Zercon spatulatus Koch, 1839
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc. 27 (27).
Irish Records : Pasture on bog ( Longworth, 1973 ).
Counties: Mayo .

• Original name :
Zercon triangularis Koch, 1836
.
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc. 4 (16).
Counties: Galway, Kilkenny, Laois, Mayo, Roscommon, Sligo, Wicklow, Wexford .

• Original name :
Zercon zelawaiensis Sellnick, 1944
.

• In :
Acari - Blätter für Milbenkunde Königsberg
, 5: 32.

Irish Records :
Sphagnum
and heather on bog ( Longworth, 1973 ); fore dunes of Machair system ( Arroyo & Bolger, 2011 ); soil under Sitka spruce; Moss on soil under oak, Scots pine and Sitka spruce; moss on oak, Scots pine, Sitka spruce and yew (
Arroyo et al ., 2012
, 2013a , b ); raised bog ( Wisdom, 2010 ;
Wisdom et al ., 2011
).
Counties: Clare, Cork, Donegal, Kerry, Laois, Mayo, Offaly, Sligo, Tipperary, Wicklow .
